CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Complete Delivery stage positioned above or below the Provide Feedback or Rating stage?
SRP.A: The Complete Delivery stage is positioned {above} the Provide Feedback or Rating stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Provide Feedback or Rating?
VE.A: The value of stage Provide Feedback or Rating is {622}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Complete Delivery?
VE.A: The value of stage Complete Delivery is {734}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Search Transport Options, with a value of {2438}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Provide Feedback or Rating, with a value of {622}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Book Transport Service to stage Prepare for Pickup?
SC.A: Decreased by {232} Thousand Shipments from stage Book Transport Service to stage Prepare for Pickup.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 1345? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Search Transport Options} stage has {2438}, the {Select Carrier or Service} stage has {1863}, the {Book Transport Service} stage has {1461}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 678? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Provide Feedback or Rating} stage has {622}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 982 and 1345? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Prepare for Pickup to Begin Transportation, or from stage Search Transport Options to Select Carrier or Service?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Search Transport Options} to {Select Carrier or Service} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Begin Transportation to Complete Delivery, or from stage Complete Delivery to Provide Feedback or Rating?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Complete Delivery} to {Provide Feedback or Rating} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Search Transport Options to Select Carrier or Service, from stage Prepare for Pickup to Begin Transportation, or from stage Begin Transportation to Complete Delivery?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Search Transport Options} to stage {Select Carrier or Service} is the greatest.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Book Transport Service to Prepare for Pickup, from stage Complete Delivery to Provide Feedback or Rating, or from stage Select Carrier or Service to Book Transport Service?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Select Carrier or Service} to stage {Book Transport Service} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Search Transport Options} and {Select Carrier or Service} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Begin Transportation} and {Complete Delivery} stages.
